title: 1995년 Cmm Cable Rep., Inc., D/B/A Creative Media Management, Inc. v. Ocean Coast Properties, Inc., D/B/A Wpor-Fm 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Cmm Cable Rep., Inc., D/B/A Creative Media Management, Inc. v. Ocean Coast Properties, Inc., D/B/A Wpor-Fm. 판결일: 1995-03-06. 법원: Court of Appeals for the First Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: CMM CABLE REP., INC., D/B/A Creative Media Management, Inc., Plaintiff, Appellant, v. OCEAN COAST PROPERTIES, INC., D/B/A WPOR-FM, Et Al., Defendants, Appellees
**판결일**: 1995-03-06
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the First Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Bownes, Selya, Stahl

## 변호인

Anne.S- Mason, with whom Mason & As-socs., P.A., John H. Rich III, William Sheils, and Perkins, Thompson, Hinckley & Keddy were on brief, for appellant., James G. Goggin, with whom Roy S. McCandless and Yemll & Dana were on brief, for appellees.

## 인용

- 48 F.3d 618

## 판결문 요약

48 F.3d 618
    1995 Copr.L.Dec. P 27,368, 34 U.S.P.Q.2d 1082
    CMM CABLE REP., INC., d/b/a Creative Media Management, Inc.,Plaintiff, Appellant,v.OCEAN COAST PROPERTIES, INC., d/b/a WPOR-FM, et al.,Defendants, Appellees.
    No. 94-2172.
    United States Court of Appeals,First Circuit.
    Heard Feb. 9, 1995.Decided March 6, 1995.
    
      Anne S. Mason, with whom Mason & Assocs., P.A., John H. Rich III, William Sheils, and Perkins, Thompson, Hinckley & Keddy were on brief, for appellant.
      James G. Goggin, with whom Roy S. McCandless and Verrill & Dana were on brief, for appellees.
      Before SELYA, Circuit Judge, BOWNES, Senior Circuit Judge, and STAHL, Circuit Judge.
      SELYA, Circuit Judge.
    
    
      1
      CMM Cable Rep., Inc.  (CMM), plaintiff below, appeals from the district court's denial of preliminary injunctive relief associated with claims of copyright infringement, trademark infringement, and unfair competition.1  We dismiss the appeal as moot.
    
    
      2
      * Because this case turns principally on its present procedural posture, we do no more than skim the facts.
    
    
      3
      CMM does business under the name and style of "Creative Media Management."   It devises promotional strategies to assist radio stations in acquiring and retaining listeners.  CMM claims to have created a promotional contest called "PAYROLL PAYOFF TM."   In due season, it trademarked the name and copyrighted various materials designed fo...
